root.name: Ankh
root.description: Features Meet a cast of bizarre characters that you can talk or bargain with, each individually animated. Dozens of lovingly crafted locations that take you away to a fantastic Egyptian world. Cinematic cut-scenes with thrilling dynamic cameras. Easy to use interface and intriguing riddles promise many hours of fun. PC System RequirementsMinimum Operating System: Windows 2000 / Windows XP Processor : Intel Pentium IV 1.5 GHz or equivalent RAM Memory: 256 MB HDD Space: 725 MB available Video Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible 64MB Video CardRecomended Operating System: Windows 2000 / Windows XP Processor : Intel Pentium IV 2.0 GHz or equivalent RAM Memory: 512 MB HDD Space: 725 MB available Video Card : DirectX 9.0c compatible Nvidia GeForce FX5900XT video card with 128 MB RAM
